channel.title: Smart npc help? what is this?
channel.description:
alright, I have this file in my server, that I never messed with until day.. called smartNPC.cfg alright? I was wondering what exactly it does, like, what the difference is between this, and regular NPCspawn.cfg if you don't know what the file I will show mine and tell me i can help :)
[code][END]
[FORMAT EXAMPLE] spawn(tab)=(tab)ID(tab)X(tab)Y(tab)H(tab)INTELLIGENCE(tab)HITPOINTS(tab)ATTACK(tab)STRENGTH(tab)DEFENCE(tab)RANGED(tab)MAGIC [/code]
I followed the format, and when I started the source, it gave me this big long error about loadNPC.. I don't wanna post it because I have my server running right now and people will get mad >.< I need help :) this isn't a rush, I just wanna know what the whole INTELLIGENCE is about, and why there is the HIPPOINTS/ATTACK/STRENGTH/DEFENSE/RANGED/MAGIC thing in there when that is in the NPClist.cfg, and how to make it not give an error.

item.title: Smart npc help? what is this?
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

In your case, the intelligence basically means that the NPC can either block your attacks, poison u, mage u, or drain stats, prayer stats ONLY, if its set to the server.

I had this b4. very easy. and the range, defence, etc. set that to 1 and his defence will either:
Block very little
drain your stat (defence)
if he attacks u, ur defence level goes to 1

BUT!!
these effects only happen if set in the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Smart npc help? what is this?

@gamerbug wrote:

alright, I have this file in my server, that I never messed with until day… called smartNPC.cfg alright?
I was wondering what exactly it does, like, what the difference is between this, and regular NPCspawn.cfg
if you don’t know what the file I will show mine and tell me i can help

[code][END]

[FORMAT EXAMPLE]
spawn(tab)=(tab)ID(tab)X(tab)Y(tab)H(tab)INTELLIGENCE(tab)HITPOINTS(tab)ATTACK(tab)STRENGTH(tab)DEFENCE(tab)RANGED(tab)MAGIC
[/code]

I followed the format, and when I started the source, it gave me this big long error about loadNPC… I don’t wanna post it because I have my server running right now and people will get mad >.<
I need help
this isn’t a rush, I just wanna know what the whole INTELLIGENCE is about, and why there is the HIPPOINTS/ATTACK/STRENGTH/DEFENSE/RANGED/MAGIC thing in there when that is in the NPClist.cfg, and how to make it not give an error.
